remarks: The lattice translation of an atom is also an atom.  TODO:  See if this can shorten some ~ ltrnel uses.  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnel.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnel.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnel.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ P e. A ) -> ( F ` P ) e. A ) $.
